name: Vagrant Hearts 2
description: The heroes are back! This is the direct sequel to the 16-bit style RPG hit "Vagrant Hearts"! Find out what happens to Scarllet and her friends in this exciting adventure full of twists and epicness.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
